_comment: Shared translations used across the application

welcome.subject: Welcome to LegacyGuard - Your Digital Legacy Journey Begins
welcome.body: Thank you for joining LegacyGuard. You've taken the first important step in protecting your family's future.
welcome.footer: If you have any questions, our support team is here to help.

inventoryComplete.subject: Life Inventory Complete - Your Personalized Plan is Ready
inventoryComplete.body: You've completed your life inventory! Based on your answers, we've created a personalized action plan to help secure your family's future.
inventoryComplete.encouragement: Remember, every small step you take today makes a big difference for your loved ones tomorrow.

guardianInvite.subject: {{inviterName}} has invited you to be their Guardian on LegacyGuard
guardianInvite.body: {{inviterName}} trusts you with an important responsibility - to be a Guardian for their digital legacy.
guardianInvite.whatThisMeans: As a Guardian, you'll have secure, read-only access to their important documents and instructions in case of emergency.

planUpgrade.subject: You've Reached Your {{planName}} Plan Limit
planUpgrade.body: You're making great progress! You've reached the {{limitType}} limit on your current plan.
planUpgrade.upgradeText: Upgrade to {{suggestedPlan}} to continue adding more {{limitType}} and unlock additional features.
